name: SpendingByWeek
description: Retrieve weekly spending data for a specified customer.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set (default: 0).

customerid.description: customerid: The unique identifier for the customer.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return (default: 10).

name: Products
description: Retrieve product information with optional filtering by product ID.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set (default: 0).

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return (default: 10).

id.description: The unique identifier for the product (optional).

name: Orders
description: Retrieve order information for a specified customer.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set (default: 0).

customerid.description: The unique identifier for the customer.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return (default: 10).

name: OrdersByTimeRange
description: Retrieves orders for a given customer within the specified time range

customerid.description: The unique identifier for the customer

fromTime.description: Returns orders where the order timestamp is larger than this RFC-3339 compliant fromTime timestamp

toTime.description: Returns orders where the order timestamp is smaller than this RFC-3339 compliant toTime timestamp

name: OrderAgain
description: Suggest products for a customer to order again based on their previous orders.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set (default: 0).

customerid.description: The unique identifier for the customer.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return (default: 10).
